alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 11:58PM CDT until June 14 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Garland County in central Arkansas... Western Saline County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Meyers, or 15 miles west of Hot Springs, moving east at 50 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR AREAS NEAR HOT SPRINGS. HAZARD...Baseball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Mountain Pine... Lonsdale... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Lofton... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Avant... Magnet Cove... Oaklawn Racetrack... Sunshine... Royal... Lena Landing Rec Area... Gulpha Gorge... Hamilton... Hempwallace... Owensville... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
